\h(《Ship Doctor》)I apologize for the abruptness. I know you don't
really need my services and have no need to
stay, but I have a favor to ask of you.\e

\h(《Ship Doctor》)But first, let me introduce myself. The name's
Doc,or that's what everyone calls me. I'm a free
doctor; I don't have a country to call home.\e

\h(《Doc》)But, that lets me live the way I want to. So, I
fly the skies and heal sick and injured sailors
wherever the winds take me.\e

\h(《Doc》)Oh, and this is Maria. She's a little quiet and
shy, but she's a good kid.\e

\h(《Vyse》)...Right.
Now what was it that you wanted to ask us to
do?\e

\h(《Doc》)Heh... Direct and to the point. I like that.
But, here. Take this lens. It's sort of related
to what I want to ask you.\e

\h(《Doc》)That thing's called a “Moon Lens.” It's a
special lens made from Moonstones. With it, you
can see things you wouldn't normally be able to.\e
\h(《Doc》)Here, put the lens on and look where I'm pointing.\e

\h(《Vyse》)Whoa! There's something... some sort of creature
right there!!!\e

\h(《Doc》)It's a “Moonfish.” They're tricky little fellas
to catch because they're, well, transparent. You
can only see them using that lens.\e

\h(《Doc》)Which brings me to the favor that I wanted to
ask of you. I want you to find as many of these
Moonfish as you can and bring them back to me.\e

\h(《Doc》)They tend to nest in populated areas for
whatever reason, so check towns and dungeons.\e

\h(《Doc》)But, they try to keep out of most people's ways,
so look in hard to reach areas like behind
buildings, under bridges, and rooftops...\e

\h(《Doc》)Oh, one more thing. Whenever you're near a
Moonfish, the Moon Lens I gave you will react
and make a sound, so pay attention.\e

\h(《Vyse》)Ok. So I use this lens to see the little guys.
How in the 6 Moons am I supposed to catch them?\e

\h(《Doc》)It's pretty easy, actually. Here, let me put the
Moon Lens into your goggles...\e

\h(《Doc》)When I'm done, you can use it when you go into
first-person point of view (Y Button).\e

\h(《Doc》)Once you find a Moonfish, a target will appear.
Line it up with the Moonfish.\e

\h(《Doc》)And when you've got the Moonfish in your sights,
just press the A Button.\e

\h(《Doc》)And here you go, the lens was a perfect fit.
Well? Sounds easy enough, right?\e

\h(《Doc》)Actually, the reason for all this is a bit
strange. A little bird got lost and found its
way to my ship.\e

\h(《Doc》)I decided to take care of it for now, but I just
don't get what this bird's problem is. He
refuses to eat anything other than Moonfish.\e

\h(《Doc》)But, for whatever reason, Maria seems to have
really grown attached to the critter. So, I do
what I can to keep it happy.\e

\h(《Doc》)It's... sorta my responsibility to take care of
Maria. Anything she wants, I provide. Of course,
there's only so much I can do.\e

\h(《Doc》)But, I can't leave my ship. I can't leave Maria
here all alone. That's why I'm asking you for
this favor.\e

\h(《Doc》)Of course, I will compensate you adequately.
Bring me lots of fish, and I'll give you items
in return.\e

\h(《Doc》)So, please... if you find any Moonfish, bring
them to me! I will be eternally grateful.\c

\h(《Doc》)Look how big your little bird has grown, Maria!
And it's all thanks to this young man and his
friends!\e
\h(《Maria》)......ank you.\e

\h(《Doc》)W, w, huh?! Maria!!! Did you just say
something?!\e
\h(《Maria》)...Thank you.\e
\h(《Doc》)M, Maria...\e
\h(《Doc》)Vyse, I... I can't thank you enough.\e

\h(《Doc》)I don't know how many years it's been since I've
heard Maria's voice.\e

\h(《Aika》)What?! You mean to tell me that your own
daughter hasn't spoken to you in years???\e

\h(《Doc》)Whoa, whoa, whoa. Back up there, honey. I'm
still single. I don't even have a wife, let
alone a kid.\e

\h(《Doc》)Maria's not my kid. She, uh... lost her family a
few years back.\e

\h(《Doc》)I may not look the part now, but at one point in
my life, I was a Valuan soldier.\e

\h(《Doc》)I worked for Mendosa, a former Admiral of
the Valuan Armada, as a doctor onboard his
flagship.\e

\h(《Doc》)And Maria is his daughter... the daughter of a
Valuan Admiral.\e

\h(《Doc》)However, when she was still very young, she lost
her father, and the rest of her family, in a
horrible accident.\e

\h(《Doc》)It was a horrifying experience for such a little
kid to go through. Since then, she hasn't shown
a hint of emotion, or spoken a single word.\e

\h(《Doc》)And I don't blame her, either. The poor kid had
to watch her family's ship, with all of her
family still onboard, sink below the clouds.\e

\h(《Doc》)So, I took her under my wing, and retired from
the military. And that's when I became a free
ship doctor.\e

\h(《Doc》)That's why it's... sorta my responsibility to
make sure Maria is happy. It's my resposibility,
and my punishment, of sorts.\e
\h(《Doc》)Hm? Oh! I'll be right there, Maria!\e

\h(《Doc》)Ever since she stopped talking, whenever she
needs me, she just rings her bell like that.\e

\h(《Doc》)And every time I hear that bell, my heart nearly
breaks...\e

\h(《Doc》)Vyse... I beg of you. Please find more
Moonfish.\e

\h(《Doc》)The little bird, for whatever reason, seems to
be getting through to Maria. She seems to be
coming out of her shell at long last.\e

\h(《Doc》)Who knows? Maybe Maria will actually smile again
someday! Heh... I probably shouldn't get my
hopes up, but I can't help it.\e

\h(《Doc》)But, I'm going to bet on you. Something tells me
that if anyone can heal Maria's wounds, it's
you. I'm counting on you, Vyse!\c
\h(《Maria》)Thank you for bringing these fish for me.\e
\h(《Doc》)M, Maria!!\e
\h(《Vyse》)Heh... For you, Maria, it's no problem at all.\e

\h(《Vyse》)If it's Moonfish you want, just leave it up to
me! I'm going to bring you more than you'll ever
need!\e
\h(《Maria》)...Thank you!\e

\h(《Doc》)Thank you, Vyse. Maria is slowly becoming
herself again.\e

\h(《Doc》)I owe everything to you. I don't know what to
say. I thank you from my the bottom of my heart.
I really do.\e

\h(《Vyse》)Aww, come on, Doc! Don't get all teary-eyed on
me. I'll just keep gathering fish to make her
happy, ok?\e

\h(《Doc》)You know, you remind me of a man
I used to work with.\e

\h(《Doc》)He was a lot like you; honest, kind... the kind
of guy that everyone likes. Well, he was a
little more refined than you, though.\e

\h(《Doc》)His name was Ramirez. I hear that he's been
promoted to the position of Admiral in the
Valuan Armada, now.\e
\h(《Fina》)...Ramirez?!\e
\h(《Doc》)Huh? You guys know him?\e
\h(《Aika》)Well, more or less...\e

\h(《Vyse》)Doc, can you tell us what you know about
Ramirez?\e
\h(《Doc》)Uh, sure...\e

\h(《Doc》)It was a long time ago... back when I was still
working for Admiral Mendosa in the
Valuan Armada.\e

\h(《Doc》)We were sailing around Mid Ocean when we
encountered a ship of the likes we had never
seen before.\e

\h(《Doc》)And aboard that ship was Ramirez. He was... an
odd fellow, to say the least. I distinctly
remember the clothes he had on... Very unusual.\e

\h(《Doc》)But, Ramirez turned out to be as intelligent as
he was good with a blade. Admiral Mendosa grew
to like him rather quickly.\e

\h(《Doc》)Admiral Mendosa saw that he had potential and
began training him to become an officer of the
Valuan Armada. He had high hopes for him...\e

\h(《Doc》)We were all surprised at how little he knew
about the world, but he was so honest and so
sincere that everyone loved him.\e

\h(《Doc》)And I, too, was glad to have a crewmate who
seemed trustworthy. Someone I could call a
friend.\e

\h(《Mendosa》)Ramirez, from this day forth, you are a member
of the Valuan Armada. Hold your chin high!\e
\h(《Ramirez》)Thank you very much for all your help, m'lord.\e

\h(《Doc》)Way to go, Ramirez! I always knew you'd make
the cut.\e
\h(《Ramirez》)Thank you, too, Doctor.\e

\h(《Doc》)Oh come on, you can stop calling me “Doctor” all
the time. Everyone just calls me Doc.\e
\h(《Mendosa》)Hahahaha... You two never change.\e

\h(《Mendosa》)I just want to let you know, you two are like
sons to me. The sons I never had. I hope I can
count on you as my right hand men.\e

\h(《Doc》)M'lord, yer being a little greedy there, aren't
ya? M'lord already has two lovely daughters of
his own, and yet he wants sons, too?\e

\h(《Mendosa》)Hahahaha... That's not what I mean. All I'm
saying is that you two can count on me as you
would a father.\e
\h(《Ramirez》)......\e

\h(《Ramirez》)M'lord... I thank you. You do not know how much
that means to me.\e

\h(《Vyse》)Who woulda thought that Doc and Ramirez used to
be buddies...\e

\h(《Doc》)Alright, Maria! I hear ya! I'll be there in a
second!\e

\h(《Doc》)Vyse, please feel free to come by and visit
whenever you want. I'm sure Maria and her little
feathered friend will be happy to see you.\e

\h(《Doc》)But don't forget to bring more Moonfish with
you! I'm sure there's plenty more still out
there somewhere!\e
\h(《Maria》)Thank you, Vyse. Picollo says thank you, too.\e
\h(《Vyse》)Heh... His name is Picollo, huh? Cute name.\e

\h(《Vyse》)Tell him that I'll bring even more fish next
time, okay?\e
\h(《Maria》)...Ok!\e
\h(《Aika》)Maria can actually talk to that bird?\e

\h(《Doc》)Sure seems like it. I don't know for sure,
though. But either way, it looks like they
understand each other on some level.\e

\h(《Doc》)Now that I think about it, even her older
sister...\e
\h(《Fina》)Um... Doc?\e
\h(《Doc》)I'm sorry I'm sorry. I was lost in thought.\e

\h(《Fina》)Doc, please... tell me about Ramirez. When you
first knew him. I must know...\e

\h(《Fina》)I need to know what happened to him... What
changed him so.\e

\h(《Doc》)Hmm... Sounds like you've got some pretty
personal reasons for wanting to know.\e

\h(《Doc》)Very well. I told you about how Ramirez and I
met, right?\e

\h(《Doc》)Well, soon after that, we were sent to Ixa'taka,
just after Valua had begun to occupy the area.\e

\h(《Doc》)What's wrong, Ramirez? Ever since we got to
Ixa'taka, you've looked troubled. Don't be
afraid to speak your mind.\e
\h(《Ramirez》)Well...\e

\h(《Ramirez》)If I may speak freely, I feel that Valua is
wrong in its ways... in the way it treats the
Ixa'takans.\e
\h(《Doc》)H, hey wait a minute there, Ramirez!\e

\h(《Ramirez》)Putting the people into slavery, forcing them to
mine for Moonstones... and all for Valua's
profit? It's horrible.\e
\h(《Doc》)Ramirez...\e

\h(《Mendosa》)...Ramirez.
You are absolutely right. I, as a father of two,
feel the same way.\e

\h(《Mendosa》)I feel a sadness deep in my heart for the plight
of the people of Ixa'taka.\e

\h(《Mendosa》)How's this, then? I will personally express
these grievances to the Empress herself. Let me
deal with it, Ramirez.\e
\h(《Ramirez》)...Thank you, m'lord.\e

\h(　)One day, we ran into Admiral Galcian in
Ixa'taka.\e

\h(　)Back then, Lord Galcian was still just another
Admiral in the Armada, but stories of his
military prowess were spreading rapidly.\e

\h(　)Actually, the reason why Valua had so easily
conquered Ixa'taka and occupied it was due to
the great military feats of Lord Galcian.\e

\h(　)Of course, Ramirez went straight to Galcian,
being the root of all the evils in Ixa'taka.\e

\h(《Ramirez》)Lord Galcian! How can you treat the Ixa'takans
like this?! It's despicable!\e

\h(《Doc》)R, Ramirez! You can't talk like that to an
Admiral!!!\e

\h(《Ramirez》)Stay out of this, Doc. This has nothing to do
with you. And no matter what happens, I know
Admiral Mendosa will stand up for me.\e

\h(《Galcian》)Admiral Mendosa?
Heh... Fool.\e

\h(《Ramirez》)What did you say?! How dare you speak ill of
Admiral Mendosa! I will not stand here and let
you tarnish his honor!\e

\h(《Galcian》)It was not Mendosa that I called a fool.
It is you, boy, who follow him so blindly, that
is the fool.\e
\h(《Ramirez》)Wh, what did you say?\e

\h(《Galcian》)People are not to be trusted. Depend on a person
too much and they will betray your trust sooner
or later.\e

\h(《Galcian》)I only believe in power. Power will never betray
you.\e

\h(《Galcian》)And that is why I search this land for an even
greater power. And if such a power exists, I
swear, it shall be mine.\e

\h(《Galcian》)You will someday understand the meaning of my
words. When that day comes, I will be awaiting
you.\e
\h(《Ramirez》)......\e

\h(《Doc》)That was the first time Ramirez and Galcian had
ever met.\e

\h(《Doc》)If I had only stopped Ramirez back then, things
may have turned out much differently.\e
\h(《Maria》)Uncle Doc?\e
\h(《Doc》)Wait a second, Maria! I'll be right there!\e

\h(《Maria》)Hehe... Ever since she started talking again,
Maria stopped using that bell and now she calls
me by name.\e

\h(《Doc》)And it always makes me feel weak in the knees
whenever she calls me “uncle.” Heh... I'm such a
sucker for those pretty little eyes.\e

\h(《Aika》)Alright, we'll get outta your way. You're
probably busy, anyway. We'll talk more about
Ramirez some other time, ok?\e

\h(《Doc》)Sure thing. And don't forget to bring more
Moonfish!\e
\h(《Maria》)Thank you for always bringing fish for me...\e
\h(《Maria》)Look how much Picollo has grown!\e

\h(《Vyse》)Whoa... And to think he used to be small enough
to fit in the palm of your hand!\e

\h(《Doc》)Tell me about it. Who'd have thought that it
would grow this big.\e
\h(《Maria》)Picollo, let's go play over there!\e
\h(《Picollo》)Chirp!\e

\h(《Doc》)Maria, be careful! If that big guy starts
running around, this rickety old ship won't hold
together long!\e

\h(《Maria》)I know!
Picollo, come on! Over here!\e

\h(《Doc》)I just wanted to thank you, Vyse. Because of you
and your crew, Maria has finally come out of her
shell. She's become herself again.\e

\h(《Doc》)In return... well, that's a strange way to put
it, but in return, I'll tell you the rest of my
story.\e

\h(《Doc》)It's hard... for me to talk about it. But, if
Maria can be strong enough to get over her
past...\e

\h(《Doc》)...I can't sit here and dwell on my past,
either. I guess I've finally become strong
enough to realize that.\e
\h(《Vyse》)Doc...\e

\h(《Doc》)Well, if you must know, then I'll tell you. I'll
tell you of the tragedy that befell Ramirez...\e

\h(《Doc》)“Depend on a person too much and they will
betray your trust sooner or later.” Or so
Galcian told Ramirez.\e

\h(《Doc》)Maybe that hit a little close to home... I don't
know. But for whatever reason, Ramirez began to
snoop around for information regarding Mendosa.\e

\h(《Doc》)And that's when we found out that... That
Mendosa was using the Ixa'takans as slaves for
his own personal profit.\e

\h(《Doc》)He forced the Ixa'takans to work a few extra
hours here and there, and pocketed all the extra
Moonstones that they found for himself.\e

\h(《Doc》)The shock of this discovery was almost too much
for Ramirez to bear. He went directly to Admiral
Mendosa and confronted him...\e

\h(《Ramirez》)M'lord!
Is... is it true? Is it true about the
Moonstones?! And the Ixa'takan slaves?!\e

\h(《Mendosa》)I won't lie to you. Yes, it is true. But, what's
the problem? Is there something wrong with
making money? With desiring wealth and power?\e

\h(《Ramirez》)You are forcing the Ixa'takans to work grueling
hours in inhumane conditions!\e

\h(《Ramirez》)M'lord, you promised me... You told me that you
would speak to Her Majesty in regards to the
way the Ixa'takans were being treated!\e

\h(《Mendosa》)Hahaha... You truly are naive, aren't you? And
what exactly do you think would have happened if
I did that?\e

\h(《Mendosa》)Her Majesty would find out about my little
scheme, and I would basically be signing my own
death warrant.\e
\h(《Ramirez》)How... how could you lie to me like that?!\e

\h(《Mendosa》)It is quite unfortunate that things had to turn
out this way, Ramirez. And to think I thought of
you as a son...\e

\h(《Mendosa》)Regardless, you have uncovered my plans and have
left me with no choice. Guards! Seize him!\e
\h(《Ramirez》)Everything... All that I have believed in...\e
\h(《Ramirez》)Aaaaaaaarrgh!\e

\h(《Doc》)By the time I got there, it was already too
late.\e

\h(《Doc》)The guards... even Admiral Mendosa... they had
all fallen under Ramirez's blade.\e

\h(《Doc》)Ramirez!!
What... what have you done?!\e
\h(《Ramirez》)I... I'm sorry, Doc.\e

\h(《Ramirez》)But, I can no longer trust humans. I can no
longer remain here.\e

\h(《Doc》)Wait! Ramirez!
Where are you going?!\e

\h(《Ramirez》)Goodbye, Doc. The Ramirez that you knew is no
more. He died the moment I drew my blade against
Admiral Mendosa.\e

\h(《Ramirez》)From now on, I will only believe in strength. I
shall only follow those with power.\e
\h(《Doc》)Wait!!! Ramirez! Ramireeeeez!!!\e

\h(《Doc》)...And so, Ramirez went to Galcian's side, and I
believe you know the rest of the story.\e

\h(《Doc》)I had spent so much time with both Mendosa and
Ramirez, and yet I could do nothing to stop this
tragedy from happening.\e

\h(《Doc》)If I only had the strength to stop him, Mendosa,
Ramirez, and even Maria... all of their lives
would have turned out so much differently.\e
\h(《Vyse》)Doc...\e

\h(《Doc》)I know, I know. I'm going to stop living in the
past. Just gotta keep looking forward and hope
for the best!\e

\h(《Doc》)And besides, I think it's a blessing that I was
able to save Maria from the burning wreckage of
the Aquila...\e

\h(《Doc》)But, I heard that some Air Pirates that were
passing through the area helped save most of the
crew after we left, though.\e
\h(《Fina》)Aquila... That name...\e

\h(《Aika》)W, wait a second there, Fina. You don't
think...?\e

\h(《Aika》)Hey, Doc... Maria wouldn't happen to have an
older sister, would she?\e

\h(《Doc》)Actually, she did. Wait, did I forget to tell
you that?\e

\h(《Doc》)Well, unfortunately, she went missing after the
accident. Nobody knows what happened to her.
Poor Piastol...\e

\h(《Doc》)It's bothered me for years that I couldn't save
both of them...\e
\h(《Fina》)Vyse, then it is her!\e

\h(《Vyse》)There's no doubt about it. Maria and Piastol are
long-lost sisters.\e
\h(《Aika》)We gotta tell Piastol!!!\e

\h(《Vyse》)Piastol said that she would come to fight us
again sometime.\e

\h(《Vyse》)When we see her, we'll tell her everything we
know. What she does with this information is up
to her.\c
\h(《Vyse》)Wow! He just keeps getting bigger and bigger!\e

\h(《Aika》)Well, I think if anything ate that many Moon
Fish, it'd grow at least half as much...\e

\h(《Aika》)But I bet that Maria's real happy that he's
grown so much! Huh, Doc?\e

\h(《Doc》)...You'd think so, but life doesn't always turn
out the way you expect.\e

\h(《Maria》)Picollo...
He wants to go home.\e
\h(《Vyse》)Huh?\e

\h(《Maria》)Picollo has grown wings... so now he's saying he
wants to go home... Home to where all his
friends are.\e

\h(《Doc》)I think he has a point, though. If we don't
return him to nature, he'll never find any of
his own kind, let alone find someone to marry.\e

\h(《Doc》)But the one thing that's keeping me worried is
if this guy leaves, Maria's going to fall into
depression again.\e
\h(《Maria》)Uncle Doc, I... I'll be fine.\e
\h(《Doc》)M, Maria??\e

\h(《Maria》)Ever since Daddy and my sister... went away,
I've been so lonely.\e
\h(《Maria》)And I think that Picollo feels lonely, too.\e

\h(《Maria》)I'm going to miss him, but I think he should go
home so he won't be lonely anymore.\e

\h(《Maria》)I have you and Vyse to take care of me, too! I
don't have to be lonely anymore!\e
\h(《Vyse》)Well! You sure have grown, Maria!\e
\h(《Doc》)Vyse... I don't know how to thank you...\e

\h(《Doc》)To think this is the same Maria that I've been
caring for all these years... I can't believe
it. I owe everything to you.\e
\h(《Vyse》)Hey! Looks like he's getting ready to leave!\e

\h(《Aika》)Sorta reminds ya of when we left Pirate Isle, eh
Vyse?\e

\h(《Maria》)Good-bye, Picollo! Be nice to your new friends!
And come back to see me sometime!\e
\h(《Maria》)Oh hey! It's Vyse!\e

\h(《Doc》)Thanks for stopping by. I don't have much to
offer in the way of comforts, but you're free to
stay as long as you wish.\e

\h(《Doc》)Oh, hey... I almost forgot to tell you
something. Piastol came by the other day.\e
\h(《Vyse》)R, really?!\e
\h(《Doc》)Yep... It was a day I'll never forget.\e
\h(《Piastol》)E, excuse me...\e

\h(《Maria》)Um...
Are you one of Uncle Doc's patients?\e
\h(《Piastol》)Heh, no...\eNothing like that.\e

\h(《Piastol》)I was... uh... just passing by and thought I'd
drop in.\e
\h(《Maria》)Oh... I see.\e

\h(《Piastol》)Were you... looking for something out there? I
saw you staring out at the sky.\e

\h(《Maria》)Yeah. My friend, Picollo, is out there
somewhere. I was just wondering how he was
doing.\e

\h(《Maria》)Picollo used to live here, but he flew home to
be with his friends. He's a bird, you know.\e
\h(《Piastol》)I see... It must be lonely for you without him.\e
\h(《Maria》)...Yeah.\e

\h(《Maria》)Picollo and I are like each other. We both were
so lonely... with no other friends.\e

\h(《Maria》)But, he grew up and was able to go see his
friends.\e
\h(《Piastol》)......\e

\h(《Maria》)But, Uncle Doc told me something. He told me
that I have a big sister.\e

\h(《Maria》)And that my big sister is out there, somewhere,
flying through the skies. I wonder if I'll ever
get to meet her?\e
\h(《Piastol》)Y, yeah...\e

\h(《Piastol》)I, I'm sure you will. Someday, you will. I just
know it.\e
\h(《Maria》)Really?? You think so! Wow...\e

\h(《Piastol》)...Would it be ok if I came back? You know, to

\h(《Merchant Ship》)This region of the sky is like a giant maze.
There are sky rifts and islands all over the
place.\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)We need to be careful around here. There are
lots of spots where Air Pirates can hide and
ambush us.\c

mind would go near the place.\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)I've heard that there are monsters on that
island, and if you fly close enough, you can
hear them at night when the winds are still.\c

\h(《Merchant Ship》)It was incredible! I heard this really loud
rumble, and my ship started shaking. I looked
over the side…\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)… I saw a whole fleet of Valuan warships. I
wonder where they were going. With a fleet that
large, they must have been attacking someone.\c

northeast of here. Just look for the
lighthouse… it'll guide you to the port.\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)You'll see it right after you go through the
rock tunnel.\c

admiral to it's ranks. That makes six main
fleets in the Armada now.\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)With that many ships, they must be up to
something. I wouldn't want to get on their bad
side.\c

ship like that before!\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)Wait a second… That's a Valuan Ship! You stole
it!!! You're either very brave… or very
stupid!\c

Yafutoma in the far east?\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)What?! You say you can reach Yafutoma by going
west, too? Wait… I don't get it…\c

\h(《Merchant Ship》)I can't believe it… Valua has been completely
destroyed. You can still smell the smoke at 100
leagues, if you're downwind.\c

lately!\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)We hear you've been really stirring things up
over in Valua. Keep up the good work.
We're behind you all the way.\c

\h(《Merchant Ship》)That stone is as good as gone. You'd have to be
crazy to go after it. Shrine Island is haunted,
you know.\c

Secondary Cannons.\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)All of the stores in Sailors' Island get regular
shipments of new goods every now and then. You
should check back there often.\c

\h(《Merchant Ship》)A Valuan ship! Please spare me! I have done
nothing wrong! I have a family to feed!!\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)What? You're Air Pirates? Heh… You scared me
there for a second. But wait… I suppose I
should still be scared, huh?\c

\h(《Merchant Ship》)You said you sailed around the world? Ha! Yeah,
right! What kind of fool do you take me for?
Everyone knows the world is flat!\c

\h(《Merchant Ship》)That massive island came up from Deep Sky and
now the sky rifts are gone!\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)I wonder if the sky rifts were formed when the
island sank into Deep Sky in the first place.\c
\h(《Merchant Ship》)I can't believe that island rose from Deep Sky!\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)Think of the impact that it's going to have on
all of the trade routes.\c

trade routes pass through here.\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)That's Sailors' Island, over there. It's in the
middle of all of the trade routes, so it's a
great place to gather information.\c

\h(《Merchant Ship》)Wow! That's an impressive weapon you have there.
Hey, is that a Harpoon Cannon? I've heard those
things can blast through stone reefs!\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)If you pass through that stone reef, and
continue west, you'll see Nasr. You'll know
you're there when you see a huge desert.\c

capital of Nasr, has been destroyed.\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)An Admiral named Ramirez leveled the place. Some
of the merchants are helping the refugees.\c
\h(《Merchant Ship》)They've reopened the route to Cape Victory!\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)Now that engineers are developing engines that
can power through sky rifts, it's even safe to
go to Esparanza now!\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)A few advances in technology can really change
the world.\c

\h(《Merchant Ship》)I heard a rumble, then there were some strong
gusts of wind. I was trying to keep control of
my ship, and that island came out of nowhere!\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)Some merchants see this as an opportunity to
make a profit, but not me! I'm more concerned
with staying alive!\c

\h(《Merchant Ship》)You guys are amazing! You actually defeated the
Valuan Armada! I can't believe it!\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)But the Valuans still have a base on that huge
island! I hope you can send that thing back into
Deep Sky where it belongs!\c

\h(《Merchant Ship》)Just recently, trade routes have been
established in North Ocean!\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)I heard that Gordo, the Air Pirate, actually
opened a restaurant out there, and I heard
that the food is really good, too!\c

\h(《Merchant Ship》)I'm not about to let that new continent scare me
away! Trade has been better than ever, lately.\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)I know Air Pirates spend all their time going
after treasure, but we have to make an honest
living.\c

\h(《Merchant Ship》)If you head due north from here, you'll run into
Valua.\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)Be careful, they won't let you in without a
Valuan Passport. And forget about sneaking
in, there are patrols all over the place.\c

\h(《Merchant Ship》)You guys are pirates, aren't you? If you are,
I'd stay clear of Valua. If they catch you,
you're as good as dead.\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)Valua has strict laws against piracy. If they
even think you're a pirate, they bring you to
the Coliseum and execute you.\c
\h(《Merchant Ship》)Did you hear what happened in Valua?\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)There's rumors that someone actually broke out
of the Grand Fortress. I'd like to meet that
guy, and shake his hand.\c

\h(《Merchant Ship》)I've seen a lot of Valuan construction ships in
the area. They must be working on something
pretty big.\c

base. They are building it on Dangral Island.\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)None of our ships can fly low enough to get a
good look at it, but there's been lots of
construction ships in the area.\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)With that ship of yours, you might be able to
see what's going on. Go south and and start
searching under the clouds. You can't miss it.\c

\h(《Merchant Ship》)You should be able to see the base, if you fly
south from here and search under the clouds.\c

\h(《Merchant Ship》)There's been a lot of Valuan ships around here
lately, so we figured that they were up to
something…\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)But I never would have guessed that they were
capable of raising an entire continent out of
Deep Sky.\c

\h(《Merchant Ship》)I can't believe it! You guys were amazing! I
never thought I'd see all of the Air Pirates
join forces and attack the Armada head on.\e

\h(《Merchant Ship》)By winning that battle, you guys changed the 
course of the world! Who knows what would 
have happened if the Armada had won?\c
\h(《Nasr Merchant Ship》)Welcome to Nasr, the desert kingdom!\e

\h(《Nasr Merchant Ship》)There's a port called Maramba nearby. Your ship

you should restock your supplies there.\c

\h(《Nasr Merchant Ship》)It looks like your ship is from Nasr, but you
don't look Nasrean. I should warn you…\e

\h(《Nasr Merchant Ship》)With a ship that small, you would never make it

headwinds there, so be careful.\e

have tried.\c

\h(《Nasr Merchant Ship》)Cape Victory? I've heard of it. It's on the

\h(《Nasr Merchant Ship》)If you want to go there, although I can't

marketplaces of the rest of the world.\e

\h(《Nasr Merchant Ship》)Nasrad may have been destroyed, but as long as
there are goods to trade, merchants like us
will survive.\c

avoid that area completely.\c

\h(《Nasr Merchant Ship》)What is it with young people these days?

\h(《Nasr Merchant Ship》)Hmm… If that's true, it might be possible to

were too strong.\e

\h(《Nasr Merchant Ship》)Trade routes have opened in North Ocean, but

skies of South Ocean are calm.\e

\h(《Nasr Merchant Ship》)Once the war is over, I may be able to open up

\h(《Dyne》)Control your altitude by pressing the R and L
Buttons. R Button will raise the ship, while L
Button will lower it. The C Stick works as well.\e

\h(《Dyne》)Whenever you want to search anything or whenever
you want to dock at a harbor, just press the
A Button.\e

\h(《Vyse》)Um… don't laugh at me, Dad… er… Captain, but
I don't remember the way home from here. Could
you tell me where to go?\e

\h(《Dyne》)How do you expect to become a good sailor if you
don't pay attention to where you are?! Just head
southeast from here.\e

\h(《Dyne》)You'll recognize the island when you see it... 
hopefully. If you get lost, you can look at a
map using the Y Button.\e

\h(《Dyne》)Also, you'll run into monsters on occasion as
you're sailing. If you do, run out to the deck
and take 'em out.\e

\h(《Dyne》)One word of warning: there are these monsters
called Maroccas that live around here. They're
pretty tough.\e

\h(《Dyne》)If you're not doing much damage on your enemy,
try hitting the Y Button to change the
properties of your weapon. It might work better.\c

\h(《Dyne》)Well, then! Full speed ahead! Destination,
Pirate Isle!\c

\h(《Drachma》)That reminds me… you should have received
something called a “Captain's Stripe.”\e

\h(《Drachma》)You'll receive one for every major battle that
you win. It's sort of like a trophy.\e

\h(《Drachma》)If you “Use” a Captain's Stripe, it will make
your ship stronger.\e
\h(《Vyse》)I see. Thanks for the advice, Captain.\c

\h(《Drachma》)It looks like we picked up a “Magic Cannon” from
the lady admiral.\e

\h(《Drachma》)Using this, we'll be able to fire cannonballs
charged with magical energy.\e

\h(《Aika》)Just like Belleza was doing, right? That's
great! Vyse! Did you hear that?! We should
really put this thing to good use!\e

\h(《Drachma》)Be careful though, boy. Using the Magic Cannon
uses up MP just like normal magic. So don't go
too crazy with it.\c

\h(《Doc》)So, how're things going? Did you catch any
Moonfish?\e

\h(《Doc》)Maria's counting on you! Make sure to bring back
a bunch of Moonfish for Maria's little friend!\c

\h(《Doc》)Hey, guys! How've you been?
Thanks to all your hard work,
Maria and I have been doing just fine.\e

\h(《Doc》)And hey... if you're ever in the area, feel
free to just stop on by whenever you want!\e
\h(《Maria》)Vyse, come back soon!\c

\h(《Maria》)Uncle Doc isn't here right now...
He had to go work.\e

\h(《Vyse》)Oh really? I guess we should come back
some other time then...\e
\h(《Vyse》)Alright, Maria. We'll be back soon!\c

\h(《Curt Voice》)Hm? Can I help you? This ship here is a free
medical vessel. Are you here for treatment? You
sick or something?\e

\h(《Vyse》)No, we're fine. We were just passing through the
area and saw your ship. We figured we'd come and
see who you were.\e

\h(《Curt Voice》)Wait a second... your clothes! Your weapons!
Your eyepatch! You guys are Air Pirtes!\e

\h(《Curt Voice》)You're just in time. There is something that I
want to ask of you guys... Please, come inside.\e

\h(《Doc》)There should be Moonfish near or on Sailors'
Island. I'm sure if you look hard enough, you
can find them.\e

\h(《Doc》)Be sure to check on top of roofs and behind
buildings! Check everywhere using your first
person point of view! Good luck!\c

\h(《Young Female Voice》)So, you're the infamous Vyse. I pictured you to
be... taller. Nevertheless, I see that you have
taken the Black Spot that I put out.\e
\h(《Young Female Voice》)Stand by. I am boarding your ship.\c

\h(《Aika》)Hey... This looks like the ship of one of the
Pirates on the Sailors' Guild Wanted List!\e

\h(《What will you do?》)“Move in closer.”
“Stay where you are.”\c

\h(《Vyse》)Hmm... This might turn into a bad situation if
we approach that ship now. Maybe we should
talk to him when we're a little more ready...\e

\h(《Aika》)Isn't it a little fishy for a boat to be out
sailing alone way out here?\e

\h(《What will you do?》)“Move in closer.”
“Stay where you are.”\c

\h(《Vyse》)Hmm... This might turn into a bad situation if
we approach that ship now. Maybe we should
talk to him when we're a little more ready...\e

\h(《Doc》)Sorry, but I'm about to make a house call.
Can ya come back a little later?\c

\h(《What will you do?》)“Enter Headquarters.”
“Fight the Special Air Pirate.”
“Return to the skies.”\c
